DIVISION OF EDUCATION
MAURICE F. SEAY
DIRECTOR
Mr. Frank E. Schooley
Nat’l. Ass’n. of Educational Broadcasters
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Frank:
Ho-w about shifting your visit to Battle Creek from April to
May — some time during the week of the 5th or the week of
the 12th. My schedule for April is very tight and I notice
that you really are plenty busy during this month yourself.
I do want to see you and Harry and I can promise you a
better "spring reception" during those two weeks of May.
Sincerely and with best wishes,
Maurice F. Seay
